title: vivo V23 Pro 5G (Sunshine Gold, 256 GB)  (12 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Headset, Documentation, USB Cable, Charger, 3.5mm Earphone Jack Adapter, Eject Tool, Phone Case, Protective Film (Applied)
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 5G: N1/N3/N5/N8/N41/N77/N78, 4G TDD LTE: B38/B40/B41(160M), 4G FDD LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B5/B8
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 108 MP AF Main (f/1.88 Aperture) + 8 MP Wide Angle (f/2.2 Aperture) + 2 MP Macro (f/2.4 Aperture), Camera Features: Eye Autofocus, Night, Ultra-Wide Night, Super Macro, Bokeh Portrait, Portrait Style, Bokeh Flare Portrait, High Resolution, Live Photo, AR Stickers, Slo-Mo, Time-Lapse, Dual-View Video, Double Exposure, Documents, Pano, Pro, Ultra Stabilization, Super Night Video, Sports Mode
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: Dual Camera: 50 MP AF (f/2.0 Aperture) + 8 MP Wide Angle (f/2.28 Aperture), Camera Feature:- Autofocus, AI Extreme Night, Steadiface Selfie Video, Multi-Style Portrait, Double Exposure, Video Face Beauty, Dual-View Video, Slo-Mo, High Resolution, Live Photo, AR Stickers, Natural Portrait, Sports Mode Selfie
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E-compass, Fingerprint Sensor (In display), Gyroscope
product_specification.Other Features: Charging Time: 1% to 63% in 30 mins Flat, Widevine L1 Certificate, 44 W Fast Charging, Material Handset: Glass
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, BEIDOU, GLONASS, GALILEO, QZSS, NavIC
product_specification.Audio Formats: WAV, MP3, MP2, MIDI, Vorbis, APE, FLAC, OPUS
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Phone and 6 Months Warranty for In the Box Accessories

product_description.Color-changing Glass: This Vivo V23 Pro mobile phone is equipped with Color-changing Glass that interacts with sunlight and Artificial UV rays to reflect a spectrum of brilliant colours, thus adding an eye-catching look to the design of the phone.
product_description.3D Curved Display: This V23 Pro features a 3D Curved Screen with a thickness of around 7.36 mm and a weight of about 171 grams to make it easy for you to carry it in your pocket.
product_description.Fluorite AG Glass Design: This mobile phone comes with a Fluorite AG Glass design that interacts with different lights, making it comfortable to hold and fingerprint-free.
product_description.50 MP Eye AF Dual Selfie: This mobile phone comes with a 50 MP sensor, complemented by pixel isolation technology so that you can capture stunning photos every time. This mobile phone also comes with an AF front camera so that you can enjoy clicking sharp focus all the time.
product_description.Dual-tone Spotlight: This phone comes with Dual-tone spotlight so that you look radiant even when the surrounding is dark. Also, the feature works with a lighting assistant that helps to adjust the colour temperature and brightness so that every portrait you capture is striking and realistic.
product_description.Super Wide-angle Night Selfie: This smartphone features a 105-degree Super Wide-Angle Camera to capture wide-angle photos and videos that cover all your friends who you don’t want to miss. And, with the Super Night Mode algorithm and Spotlight, you can enhance the brightness of your face even in a dark environment.
product_description.108 MP Main Camera: This smartphone comes with a 108 MP main camera that lets you capture clear and high-definition details with 12000*9000 resolution even when captured from a far distance.
product_description.Super Night Video: This smartphone comes with a Super Night Video Mode so that you can enjoy capturing crystal clear perspective even during the night surrounding.
product_description.Lightning-fast Performance: This smartphone is powered by a 6 nm MediaTek Dimensity 1200 processor that offers a seamless mobile computing experience and allows you to multitask with ease. Also, this smartphone comes with a dual 5G standby feature so that you can avail high-speed internet access. Moreover, the MediaTek processor helps to ensure low power consumption to deliver a long and smooth performance.
product_description.44 W Flash Charge: This smartphone comes with a 4300 mAh (TYP) large battery and 44 W FlashCharge so that your smartphone battery does not run out of charge and you stay connected to your phone without interruptions.
product_description.Extended RAM 2.0: This smartphone is equipped with 4 GB of ROM space and 12 GB of RAM 2.0 that helps to boost your phone’s performance and allow your favourite apps to run fast without lag.
product_description.Funtouch OS 12 (Based on Android 12): This Vivo smartphone runs on the Funtouch OS 12 (based on Android 12) that features a user-friendly feature and aesthetic user experience.

review: Nice product, good camera quality, very slim and light weight. It has a very beautiful screen design. Sound quality is good too.

For the price it's a good phone with curved display. Performance is good in normal day to day use without any lag. Best is the display and form factor it's light and comfortable to hold even with the cover. Camera is good especially the front one with two additional lighs with colour temperature control only ensure to switch off the beauty mode.as it oversaturates the image. Good buy.

Very nice smooth good looking mobile
Camera is more than good
Awesome experience with vivo , camera performance is awesome
Total Phone is Awesome. But Battery back up is worsted. Drain faster. 10 percent battery drain With in 15mins.
Prodect was very nice and looking gorgeous back and fornt

pros.Build Quality: The build quality of this phone is good. It is slim and very comfortable use.

cons.4300 mAh Battery: The 4300 mAh battery should have been better at this price range. The battery drains fast and is not long lasting.
cons.Camera: The triple rear camera setup and dual front camera setup is not upto the mark. The quality is just decent enough.
cons.Heating issues: There are some heating issues with this device.

summary.verdict: The vivo V23 Pro 5G is not a recommended purchase at this price segment.
summary.Additional Information: In display fingerprint lock, Dual Nano sim support.
